title: Incorporating Machine Learning with Cloud Based HVAC Monitoring Systems - Milestone 2 Report
abstract: Capstone project testing machine learning and data science algorithms on HVAC sensor data to detect anomalies and validate PowerTron PermaFrost treatment effectiveness. Methods include Random Forest, MAD thresholding, Hierarchical Clustering, and Archetypes Analysis.
corpus_relevance: Independent academic validation using ML algorithms to prove PermaFrost treatment efficacy on HVAC systems.
